duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet or exceed district quotas for 'Retail Volume' and 'Dealer Penetration' goals.
Effectively manage the overall district through analysis of potential dealer and customer opportunities.
Develop actionable and measurable territory plans to achieve targeted goals.
Directly interact and collaborate with Volvo and Mack Truck field representatives to ensure support for OEMs' efforts.
Support Mack and Volvo OEM’s efforts on conquest and targeted customers by team selling and bundling of the truck sale with financial services.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in Finance, Marketing or closely related (Master’s degree preferred)
